nodes.text: Trole was a Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport the Rebel Alliance employed during the Galactic Civil War.

The transport was present at an Rebel Alliance starfighter base which housed A-wings, B-wings Y-wings, X-wings and Z-95 Headhunters. The base was attacked by the Imperial Nebulon-B frigate Lightning. The transport was destroyed, along with the rest of the base. The events regarding the Imperial attack were recorded and recreated as a training mission in the Combat chamber to train future pilots such as Maarek Stele.
